elementSpec.desc: defines a written surface in terms of a rectangular coordinate space, optionally grouping one or more graphic representations of that space, and rectangular zones of interest within it.

définit une surface écrite en termes de coordonnées spatiales rectangulaires, regroupant éventuellement une ou plusieurs représentations graphiques de cet espace et des zones rectangulaires intéressantes à l'intérieur de celui-ci
矩形の座標により，書記の表面を定義する．選択的に，空間や矩形範囲中のひ とつ以上の図表表現をまとめる．

definisce una superficie scritta in termini di uno spazio rettangolare di coordinate, eventualmente che raggruppi una o più rappresentazioni grafiche di tale spazio, e delle zone rettangolari di interesse all'interno di questo

attDef.desc: points to an element which encodes the starting position of the text corresponding to the inscribed part of the surface.
pointe vers un élément qui encode la position de départ du texte correspondant à la partie de la surface portant une inscription
刻字されたテキストの始点を表す要素を指示する．
indica un elemento che codifica la posizione di partenza del testo corrispondente alla parte iscritta sulla superficie

remarks.p: The surface element represents a rectangular area of any physical surface forming part of the source material. This may be a sheet of paper, one face of a monument, a billboard, a papyrus scroll, or indeed any 2-dimensional surface.

The coordinate space defined by this element may be thought of as a grid lrx - ulx units wide and uly - lry units high. This grid is superimposed on the whole of any image directly contained by the surface element. The coordinate values used by every zone element contained by this surface are to be understood with reference to the same grid.
